text: Defi may refer to: * 10332 Défi or 10332 Defi (1991 JT1), main belt asteroid discovered in 1991 * Le Défi, a defunct America's Cup syndicate from France * Défi sportif, disabled multisport event * Le Défi Media Group, mass media company in Mauritius * Defi language * Democratic Federalist Independent, a political party in Belgium * Decentralized Finance, a form of cryptocurrency trading
title: Defi
